metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9796 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: A use-after-free vulnerability can occur when the SMIL animation controller incorrectly registers with the refresh driver twice when only a single registration is expected. When a registration is later freed with the removal of the animation controller element, the refresh driver incorrectly leaves a dangling pointer to the driver's observer array. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 60.6, Firefox ESR < 60.6, and Firefox < 66.

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '66.0+build3-0ubuntu1').
thunderbird package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '60.6.1+build2-0ubuntu1').
